long_description: The men's Marmot Ridgerock rain jacket gives you waterproof, breathable protection for outdoor fun, balancing light weight with just the right number of bells and whistles. 2-layer, 100% seam-sealed construction uses a GORE-TEX(R) membrane bonded to polyester, and protected on the inside with a separate lining for wearable comfort. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves allow full range of arm motion and prevent jacket from rising up when arms are raised. Attached hood rolls up and stows in the collar, which is lined with moisture-wicking DriClime(R) for comfort. Pit zips vent excess heat as you hike or climb hard. Chest pocket has water-resistant zipper; two zippered hand pockets. The men's Marmot Ridgerock rain jacket has adjustable cuffs and an elastic drawcord hem.
